ing: 3 tablespoons agave syrup, or to taste
2 tablespoons cocoa powder, or to taste
des: "This raw chocolate mousse is smooth, creamy, and soft. It just melts in your mouth. With only a few ingredients you will make this healthy dessert in a couple of minutes."
ins: Blend cashews in a blender to smooth butter consistency, about 2 minutes. Add agave syrup, cocoa powder, and coconut cream; blend until smooth and creamy.
